languages.text: "Возможно, Лорд-капитан, вас заинтересует вокс-передача, которую я перехватила не так давно. В тщательно зашифрованном сообщении были указаны координаты некой планеты с местом высадки и пометкой "Редкий груз". Выяснить больше мне не удалось, но думаю, шифровка предназначалась тем, кто... вовлечен в несанкционированную торговлю".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, Лорд-капитан, вас заинтересует вокс-передача, которую я перехватила не так давно. В тщательно зашифрованном сообщении были указаны координаты некой планеты с местом высадки и пометкой "Редкий груз". Выяснить больше мне не удалось, но думаю, шифровка предназначалась тем, кто... вовлечен в несанкционированную торговлю".

languages.text: "Perhaps you would be interested in a vox-transmission I intercepted not long ago, Lord Captain. The thoroughly encrypted message contained the coordinates of a landing site on a certain planet, marked as 'rare cargo.' I have not been able to uncover anything else, but I believe the encryption was intended for those who are... involved in unsanctioned trade activities."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, Лорд-капитан, вас заинтересует вокс-передача, которую я перехватила не так давно. Выяснить больше мне не удалось, но думаю, шифровка предназначалась тем, кто... вовлечен в несанкционированную торговлю".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps you would be interested in a vox transmission I intercepted not long ago, Lord Captain. The carefully encrypted message contained the coordinates of a certain planet with a landing site and the notation 'Rare Cargo'. I have not been able to uncover anything else, but I believe the encryption was intended for those who are... involved in unsanctioned business activities."

languages.text: « Peut-être seriez-vous {mf|intéressé|intéressée} par une transmission-vox que j'ai interceptée il y a peu. Il s'agit d'un message chiffré contenant les coordonnées d'un site d'atterrissage sur une certaine planète, annoté de la mention "Cargaison rare". Je n'ai pas pu en savoir plus, mais je pense que ce chiffrement était destiné à des personnes impliquées dans des activités commerciales non sanctionnées. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would be interested in a vox-transmission I intercepted not long ago, Lord Captain. The thoroughly encrypted message contained the coordinates of a landing site on a certain planet, marked as 'rare cargo.' I have not been able to uncover anything else, but I believe the encryption was intended for those who are... involved in unsanctioned trade activities."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être seriez-vous {mf|intéressé|intéressée} par une transmission-vox que j'ai interceptée il y a peu. Il s'agit d'un message chiffré contenant les coordonnées d'un site d'atterrissage sur une certaine planète, annoté de la mention "Cargaison rare". Je n'ai pas pu en savoir plus, mais je pense que ce chiffrement était destiné à des personnes impliquées dans des activités commerciales non sanctionnées. »

languages.text: “或许我不久前截获的音阵讯息会引起您的兴趣，舰长大人。这条信息经过充分加密，指向了某颗行星的着陆点，上面的坐标被标记为‘稀有货物’。除此之外，我没有发现任何其他东西。不过我相信，这则加密讯息是给那些……参与非法贸易活动的人的。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would be interested in a vox-transmission I intercepted not long ago, Lord Captain. The thoroughly encrypted message contained the coordinates of a landing site on a certain planet, marked as 'rare cargo.' I have not been able to uncover anything else, but I believe the encryption was intended for those who are... involved in unsanctioned trade activities."

traits.locale_text: “或许我不久前截获的音阵讯息会引起您的兴趣，舰长大人。这条信息经过充分加密，指向了某颗行星的着陆点，上面的坐标被标记为‘稀有货物’。除此之外，我没有发现任何其他东西。不过我相信，这则加密讯息是给那些……参与非法贸易活动的人的。”

languages.text: "Vielleicht interessiert Euch eine Vox-Übertragung, die ich vor kurzem abgefangen habe, Lord Captain. Die aufwändig verschlüsselte Nachricht enthielt die Koordinaten eines Landepunkts auf einem Planeten, mit dem Zusatz 'seltene Fracht'. Ich konnte nichts anderes herausfinden, doch ich glaube, die Verschlüsselung war für jene bestimmt, die ... unsanktionierten Handel betreiben."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would be interested in a vox-transmission I intercepted not long ago, Lord Captain. The thoroughly encrypted message contained the coordinates of a landing site on a certain planet, marked as 'rare cargo.' I have not been able to uncover anything else, but I believe the encryption was intended for those who are... involved in unsanctioned trade activities."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht interessiert Euch eine Vox-Übertragung, die ich vor kurzem abgefangen habe, Lord Captain. Die aufwändig verschlüsselte Nachricht enthielt die Koordinaten eines Landepunkts auf einem Planeten, mit dem Zusatz 'seltene Fracht'. Ich konnte nichts anderes herausfinden, doch ich glaube, die Verschlüsselung war für jene bestimmt, die ... unsanktionierten Handel betreiben."

languages.text: «Puede que le interese una transmisión de voco que intercepté hace poco, Lord Capitán. Era un mensaje extremadamente encriptado que contenía las coordenadas de un lugar de aterrizaje en cierto planeta, marcado como "cargamento extraño". No he podido descubrir nada más, pero creo que el mensaje estaba destinado a aquellos que se dedican a actividades comerciales no autorizadas...».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would be interested in a vox-transmission I intercepted not long ago, Lord Captain. The thoroughly encrypted message contained the coordinates of a landing site on a certain planet, marked as 'rare cargo.' I have not been able to uncover anything else, but I believe the encryption was intended for those who are... involved in unsanctioned trade activities."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que le interese una transmisión de voco que intercepté hace poco, Lord Capitán. Era un mensaje extremadamente encriptado que contenía las coordenadas de un lugar de aterrizaje en cierto planeta, marcado como "cargamento extraño". No he podido descubrir nada más, pero creo que el mensaje estaba destinado a aquellos que se dedican a actividades comerciales no autorizadas...».

languages.text: 「少し前に私が傍受したヴォクス送信に興味がおありでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン。厳重に暗号化されたメッセージには、特定の惑星上の着陸地点の座標が含まれており、『珍しい貨物』としてマークされています。私では他に何も見つけられませんでしたが、この暗号は…非認可の取引活動に関与している者たちに向けられたものだと考えています」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would be interested in a vox-transmission I intercepted not long ago, Lord Captain. The thoroughly encrypted message contained the coordinates of a landing site on a certain planet, marked as 'rare cargo.' I have not been able to uncover anything else, but I believe the encryption was intended for those who are... involved in unsanctioned trade activities."

traits.locale_text: 「少し前に私が傍受したヴォクス送信に興味がおありでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン。厳重に暗号化されたメッセージには、特定の惑星上の着陸地点の座標が含まれており、『珍しい貨物』としてマークされています。私では他に何も見つけられませんでしたが、この暗号は…非認可の取引活動に関与している者たちに向けられたものだと考えています」

languages.text: "Kısa süre önce yakaladığım bir voks iletisi ilginizi çekebilir Lord Kaptan. Özenle şifrelenmiş mesajın içerisinde, belli bir gezegendeki bir iniş bölgesinin koordinatları girili olup 'nadir sevkiyat' olarak işaretlenmişti. Başka bir şeyi kurtarmayı başaramadım ancak şifrenin, izinsiz ticaret faaliyetleri yürüten kimseler için olduğunu tahmin ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would be interested in a vox-transmission I intercepted not long ago, Lord Captain. The thoroughly encrypted message contained the coordinates of a landing site on a certain planet, marked as 'rare cargo.' I have not been able to uncover anything else, but I believe the encryption was intended for those who are... involved in unsanctioned trade activities."

traits.locale_text: "Belki kısa süre önce yakaladığım bir voks iletisi ilginizi çeker Lord Kaptan. Özenle şifrelenmiş mesajın içerisinde belli bir gezegendeki bir iniş sahasının koordinatları giriliydi ve 'nadir sevkiyat' olarak işaretlenmişti. Başka bir şeyi kurtarmayı başaramadım ancak şifrenin izinsiz ticaret faaliyetleriyle içli dışlı kişiler için olduğunu tahmin ediyorum."
